atk-vin02a310:2_1: Pañcasatikakkhandhake – cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā avasesāni khuddānukhuddakānīti evamādi ekasikkhāpadampi apariccajitvā sabbesaṁ saṅgahetabbabhāvadassanatthaṁ pariyāyena vuttaṁ.
atk-vin02a310:2_2: Idaṁ vo samaṇānanti idaṁ samaṇānaṁ. Padapūraṇamatte vokāro.
atk-vin02a310:3_0: 443.Idampi te āvuso ānanda dukkaṭanti ‘‘idaṁ tayā duṭṭhu kata’’nti kevalaṁ garahantehi therehi vuttaṁ , na āpattiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-vin02a310:3_1: Na hi te āpattānāpattiṁ na jānanti.
atk-vin02a310:3_2: Idāneva cetaṁ anussāvitaṁ – ‘‘saṅgho apaññattaṁ na paññapeti,
atk-vin02a310:3_4: Desehi taṁ dukkaṭanti idampi ca ‘‘āma, bhante,
atk-vin02a310:3_6: taṁ dukkaṭanti idaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, na āpattidesanaṁ.
atk-vin02a310:3_7: Thero pana yasmā asatiyā na pucchi na anādarena,
atk-vin02a310:3_8: tasmā tattha duṭṭhukatabhāvampi asallakkhento ‘‘nāhaṁ taṁ dukkaṭaṁ passāmī’’ti vatvā theresu gāravaṁ dassento ‘‘apicāyasmantānaṁ sandhāya desemi taṁ dukkaṭa’’nti āha. Yathā tumhe vadatha,
